name: Lexigan
description:
From disorder comes order. And rose. And diode, ode, redo, sordid, and more such words containing 'o'. Combine alphabets to make words, BUT - you must include the center letter each time.

Sounds simple? Find out for yourself in 6 letter, 7 letter and the ultimate 8 letter difficulty mode. Multiple time options allow you to configure the game-play to your satisfaction.

Compare yourself with players worldwide in the Global Leaderboards on Game Center – for each combination of time and difficulty mode.
